page.title: 18Rail Communication Sheffield
page.content:
The area certainly does not reflect British Rail's motto '{This is the Age {of the Train'}. Now only 2 lines operate.{Wincobank Station}is closed and passengers from Leeds and Barnsley can alight only at{Brightside Station} during the morning rush hour. Apart from these, inter-city trains on the Sheffield / Leeds route merely pass through. Freight trains are seen less too with the decline of local steel industries. Coal is the main cargo passing through.
Per Week North South Passenger 412 372 { } Parcel 58 75 Freight 35 42
